subject: Lecture Slides - Week 6 KV5002
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I noticed that the lecture slides for Week 6 of KV5002 haven't been uploaded to Blackboard yet. Could you let me know when they'll be available? I'd like to review them before next week's session.

Thank you,
Emily Chen

subject: cant access blackboard
body:
hi

blackboard isnt letting me into the kv4006 module page. it says i dont have access but im definitely enrolled. can u sort this out or do i need to contact IT??

its been like this for 3 days now and im missing stuff

cheers
jake

subject: Recommended Reading for Literature Review
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm working on the literature review for my KV6003 project and I'm struggling to find enough quality sources on email classification using NLP. Could you recommend any key papers or textbooks I should be looking at?

I've already found a few through the library but I feel like I'm missing some foundational work.

Kind regards,
Olivia Hughes

subject: recording of last lecture
body:
hi dr smith

i was ill last week and missed the kv5002 lecture on software testing. is there a recording on panopto?? i cant find it anywhere on blackboard

thx
ryan

subject: Software Installation Help - Python
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm trying to install Python and Jupyter Notebook on my personal laptop for KV6003 but I'm running into errors. I followed the instructions on Blackboard but the Anaconda installer keeps failing. Are there alternative installation instructions or could you point me to a guide?

Also, is there a specific version of Python we need to be using for the module?

Thanks,
Fatima Al-Rashid

subject: where is the module handbook
body:
hi

where can i find the module handbook for kv5002?? someone said its on blackboard but i genuinely cant see it. ive looked in every folder

pls help
megan

subject: GitHub Classroom Access
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm trying to access the GitHub Classroom repository for KV5002 but the invite link from Blackboard gives me a 404 error. I've tried on both Chrome and Firefox. My GitHub username is dkim_dev22.

Could you resend the invite or check if there's an issue with the link?

Regards,
David Kim

subject: past exam papers kv4006
body:
hi

are there any past exam papers for kv4006 available anywhere?? ive checked the library and the module page but cant find any. would be really helpful for revision

ta
ben

subject: Database Software for KV4006
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

In the last lecture you mentioned we'd need MySQL Workbench for the practical sessions. Is this available on the university lab computers or do we need to install it ourselves? If we need to install it, is there a student licence or should we use the community edition?

Thank you,
Priya Patel

subject: CANT FIND ANYTHING ON BLACKBOARD
body:
HI DR SMITH

I CANT FIND ANY OF THE RESOURCES FOR KV6003 ON BLACKBOARD. THE MODULE PAGE JUST HAS THE ASSIGNMENT BRIEF AND NOTHING ELSE. WHERE ARE THE LECTURE SLIDES AND THE READING LIST AND THE PROJECT GUIDELINES??

AM I LOOKING IN THE WRONG PLACE??

MICHAEL

subject: Additional Resources for Machine Learning Topic
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I've been going through the KV5002 content on machine learning algorithms and I'm finding the lecture material quite high-level. Are there any additional resources you'd recommend — YouTube channels, online courses, or supplementary textbooks — that might help me understand the concepts in more depth?

I learn better with worked examples if that helps narrow it down.

Best wishes,
Rebecca Lawrence

subject: slides from week 3??
body:
hi

i know this is ages ago but is there any chance u could reupload the week 3 slides for kv4006?? the link on blackboard is broken and just takes me to a blank page. ive asked a few others and they have the same problem

sorry
liam

subject: Access to University Software Remotely
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm a commuter student and I do most of my work from home. Is there a way to access the university's software remotely — specifically the tools we use for KV4006 like MySQL and the Oracle database? I heard there's a virtual desktop but I'm not sure how to set it up.

Any guidance would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Nathan Brooks

subject: reading list not working
body:
the reading list link on blackboard for kv5002 takes me to the library page but all the links to the actual books and papers say 'access denied'. i think the library subscriptions might have expired or something??

can u send the pdfs directly or tell me how to access them

thx
katie

subject: KV6003 Project Template
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

Is there a report template we should be using for the KV6003 project submission? I want to make sure I'm following the correct formatting and structure. If there isn't a template, could you advise on the expected format — font size, line spacing, heading structure etc.?

Thank you,
Zara Ahmed

subject: sample code from lecture
body:
hi dr smith

in the kv5002 lecture on wednesday you showed some sample code for the observer pattern. are you going to upload that code to blackboard or github?? i tried to copy it down during the lecture but i missed some of it

cheers
josh

subject: Lecture Recording Quality Issue
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I've been watching the KV4006 Panopto recordings and the audio quality on the last three recordings has been very poor — there's a constant buzzing sound and your voice cuts out frequently. It's quite difficult to follow.

Is there anything that can be done to fix this? Could you perhaps upload the slides with audio notes as an alternative?

Thanks,
Sophie Green

body:
hi

where can i download the dataset we need for the kv5002 assignment?? i cant see it on blackboard and the link in the brief doesnt work

this is urgent because the assignment is due next week

dan

subject: Textbook Recommendation
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm looking to buy a textbook for KV4006 to supplement my studies. The reading list has several options — which one would you personally recommend as the most useful? I can only afford one so I want to make sure I pick the right one.

Many thanks,
Alex Turner

body:

James

subject: Tutorial Solutions

Best regards,

subject: Library Access for External Journals
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm trying to access some IEEE and ACM papers for my KV6003 literature review but the library portal keeps asking me to pay. I thought we had institutional access to these databases? Am I doing something wrong or do I need to request access separately?

Thank you,
Hannah Wright

subject: Blackboard App Not Syncing
body:
hi dr smith

the blackboard app on my phone isnt syncing properly for any of my modules. kv5002 and kv4006 both show old content from last semester. ive tried logging out and back in but nothing changes. i know this is probably an IT thing but do u know if anyone else has reported it??

sorry to bother u with this
chloe
